input.sentences: the spring made all the flowers bloom .
we went out around the park to take pictures .
i had gotten a new camera and was eager to test it out .
i was also impressed with the ability to take normal pictures .
output.sentences: It was finally Spring,and time for flowers, and the Bloom meeting.
We gathered in the park to take a lot of pictures.
I was eager to test my new camera, but couldn't figure out how to zoom.
I wasn't sure how I could take any pictures closeup without moving forward.
So that's what I did, and my pictures looked normal, and the county officials were even impressed!
